channel.title: How To Make "Owner Logged In" Global Message
channel.description: Title basically sais it all.... if you know how please tell me. :D Thanks, Adam.

item.title: How To Make "Owner Logged In" Global Message
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“adamgulka, post:11, topic:519607”][quote author=GodexCAB link=topic=638072.msg4300980#msg4300980 date=1368985974]

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }
[/quote]

I like this one, but what file do i put it in?.. im a noob at coding :([/quote]

Go into your client.java and search for

[code] playerServer = “SERVER IP”;

        if (loadmoreinfo() == 3) {
            returnCode = 5;
            playerName = "_";
            disconnected = true;
        }[/code]

or something like that.
I have my code

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }
right above that.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Make "Owner Logged In" Global Message

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }
[/quote]

I like this one, but what file do i put it in?.. im a noob at coding :([/quote]

Under your initialize method in your client.java

item.title: How To Make "Owner Logged In" Global Message
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

[quote=“GodexCAB, post:7, topic:519607”]else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }

OR

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner & Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }

This code is pretty stupid because you are

Are you calling me stupid?[/quote]
I never said you are stupid i said the code is stupid and i only wanted you to understand, you are checking for ONE player name so no reason to check with +playerName

Read full topic

This code is pretty stupid because you are check the player name (“Owner”) and then send message to all using +playerName? if you make this work for only one man dont use +sign
but if you use more then 1 check in the if statement use +sign
